lines.text: [an explosion has occured in the Chemistry room]
Oh dear. I told Bessie to be careful with that nitro-glycerine!
Monica Drew wasn't expelled when she burnt down the gymnasium.
The gymnasium was insured! The sports pavilion was not.
You wouldn't mind giving me the name of your phyciatrist, would you?
I cannot afford to have continual arson about in my school!

[on entering the staff room that has a heavy pall of cigarette smoke]
Oh, this place, always reminds me of a ladies powder room in Port Said.
